promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word name for a massive epic ibex psychic-type pokemon wearing a golden crystal headband. It can be found in crypt-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, psychic or ibex. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Cryptigoat, a a massive epic ibex psychic-type pokemon. It can be found in crypt-like environments It has the following abilities: Portal Strike. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "ibex", "psychic" or "Cryptigoat". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of psychic-type pokemon, ibex-like, epic, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, violet shadows
generatedDescription: Dwelling in eerie catacombs, the colossal Cryptigoat emanates mystic energy. This mythical chimera can warp reality with its Portal Strike power.
